name: Planet Of The Fat Men
description:
"Planet of Fat Men" is a colorful puzzle created from the magnificent paintings of the Russian artist Boris Ivanov, in which you do not need to drag and drop objects, just swap them by clicking on them with the mouse. The game has 20 levels, each puzzle consists of 35 elements. At the beginning of the game, the hint is given for 5 seconds and then disappears. With the right decision, you will automatically go to the next level, but if passing the level caused you difficulty, then you can skip it. The game has a choice of levels and you can start playing from any level. The difficulty of the game is medium, suitable for both adults and children.

All pictures are used with the personal permission of the author.
